nodes.text: DS-224 Colossus was the designation of a battle droid located on Quesh around 3642 BBY, when it was destroyed.

DS-224 Colossus appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Quesh. It is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means it was destroyed.
